entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
